content:
StyleSimulations Enum

Definition

Defines an enumerator class that describes the simulation style of a font.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum StyleSimulations
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
StyleSimulations

Fields

BoldItalicSimulation

Bold and Italic style simulation.
BoldSimulation

Bold style simulation.
ItalicSimulation

Italic style simulation.
None

No font style simulation.
